issue.title: [R] Fix build failures on Windows when multiple libarrow binaries found
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11230](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11230). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`r/configure.win` fails to write the contents of `r/src/Makevars.win` when it finds more than one version of the libarrow binaries in `r/windows/`. Fix this by finding only the libarrow binary with the highest version number if there is more than one present.
